if(UNIX)
  if(NEO_ENABLE_I915_PRELIM_DETECTION)
    target_sources(${TARGET_NAME} PRIVATE
                   ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMakeLists.txt
                   ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test_cache_reservation_impl_prelim.cpp
    )
  endif()
  add_subdirectories()
endif()
